q: True prayer has no set form.
h:
“True prayer has no set form.” —
Morihei Ueshiba

q: There are no contests in the Art of Peace. A true warrior is invincible because he or she contests with nothing.
h:
“There are no contests in the Art of Peace. A true warrior is invincible because he or she contests with nothing.” —
Morihei Ueshiba

q: The Art of Peace begins with you.
h:
“The Art of Peace begins with you.” —
Morihei Ueshiba

q: The Art of Peace begins with you.
h:
“The Art of Peace begins with you.” —
Morihei Ueshiba

q: When you lose your desire for things that do not matter, you will be free.
h:
“When you lose your desire for things that do not matter, you will be free.” —
Morihei Ueshiba

q: A good stance and posture reflect a proper state of mind.
h:
“A good stance and posture reflect a proper state of mind.” —
Morihei Ueshiba
